basics.name: Matthew Whited
basics.label: Principal Solutions Architect
basics.summary: Highly accomplished Principal Solutions Architect with over 20 years of experience in software development, architecture, and technical leadership. I excel in designing complex systems, optimizing performance, and creating reusable frameworks that enhance productivity and code quality. My expertise spans various programming languages, databases, cloud services, and embedded systems. I have developed innovative frameworks, led professional development and mentorship programs, and am passionate about continuous learning. I actively contribute to open-source projects and stay at the forefront of emerging technologies.
